text: Frank Herzog is a former sportscaster who was the voice of the Washington Redskins. He was also the voice of the Maryland Terrapins football and basketball teams as well as the Washington Bullets. He called college football and basketball games for CBS. ==References== Category:Living people Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:College football broadcasters Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Frank Herzog
